thread.title: Michael Strahan Reveals He's in 'a Serious Relationship'
thread.title_full: Michael Strahan Reveals He's in 'a Serious Relationship'

title: Michael Strahan Reveals He's in 'a Serious Relationship'
text:
Michael Strahan Reveals He's in 'a Serious Relationship' Posted just a moment ago 
ABC/Ida Mae Astute (NEW YORK) -- Michael Strahan has become one of the hottest bachelors in Hollywood since his failed engagement to Eddie Murphy's ex, Nicole. But now, unfortunately for the ladies, apparently he's off the market. 
When asked by Andy Cohen, the host of Watch What Happens Live! , if he was "single, dating, looking" Thursday night, the host of Live with Kelly and Michael revealed his dating status. 
"I'm in a serious relationship," he said. 
Shocked by his admission, Cohen replied: "Is that right?" 
"You want me to give you the full name?" the former New York Giants player teased, before adding, "None of your business." 
This is the first serious relationship Strahan has made public since he and Murphy called off their five-year engagement in August 2014. 
Strahan said since then, he's learned to keep his love life out of the public eye. "You know one thing I've learned, the whole public relationship thing doesn't work," Strahan explained. "It doesn't work. So I prefer to do my own thing and live my life away from that. Puts too much pressure on it."
